source_text: The other component of the consideration payable to DGRM and NWT is a combined 2% net smelter return royalty in respect of revenue generated from any future production from the Mineral Claims.
additional_details: The royalty is paid by Trinex Minerals (or its subsidiary Trinex Lithium Limited) as the acquirer of the EYL Project. It is received by DG Resource Management Ltd. (DGRM) and 507976 N.W.T. Ltd. (NWT), with each receiving 50% of the royalty.
